text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) leukayk borsa pir neak( mean chomnue ning kmean chomnue) mk thveu cheauteahar dl puokke( puok kmean chomnue) del yeung ban bratan aoy ke( anak kmean chomnue) mneak nei ke teangpir nouv chamkar tompeangbaychour pir haey yeung ban thveu robng pidaem lmeu ptthochoumvinh vea teangpir promteang yeung ban thveu aoy mean damnam phe sa ng nowchanloh chamkar teangpir noh tiet
